name: Crypt Crawler
description:
Made for ProcJam 2018! 

A first person dungeon crawling adventure with random dungeons. No real end, just look for the stairs on each floor to get to the next one.

The red bar is health, the green bar is stamina for holding up the shield (can only hold the shield up when you have stamina)

You have momentum to your moves, so if you run and shield or attack it'll knock enemies back further.

~Controls~
Move: wasd
Look: mouse
Attack: left mouse button
Block: right mouse button
Escape: quit
Tab: toggle map
Increase mouse sensitivity: +
Decrease mouse sensitivity: -

List of assets used:

- https://opengameart.org/content/shield-sword

- https://opengameart.org/content/tree-and-outside-object-pack

- https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-sound-effects-library

- https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack

- https://opengameart.org/content/bullet-collection-2-m484-games

- https://opengameart.org/content/lowpoly-rigged-skeleton-with-ik-blend

- https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-rat

- https://opengameart.org/content/horror-sound-effects-library

- https://opengameart.org/content/gold-skull
